body_html: @mholzel I wanted to thank you for that jacobian implementation, seems to work perfectly for a problem I am working on. In my opinion, this capability should be pushed to the main TensorFlow branch, as it is useful in many problems.
body_text: @mholzel I wanted to thank you for that jacobian implementation, seems to work perfectly for a problem I am working on. In my opinion, this capability should be pushed to the main TensorFlow branch, as it is useful in many problems.
body: @mholzel I wanted to thank you for that `jacobian` implementation, seems to work perfectly for a problem I am working on. In my opinion, this capability should be pushed to the main TensorFlow branch, as it is useful in many problems.
